Experimental Taiwan Pt 2
Fujui Wang, Lu Yi, and Tadeo Sendon on Resonance FM

2018: The Year in Music India Jordan on Resonance FM

Apologies for the interference at the start of the show

In our final show of the year, we spoke to India Jordan of New Atlantis about the year in the music: the releases, gigs, and labels that made 2018.

###Tracklist:

Legacy Support // Akzidenz
Pierrot // Alex Zhang Hungtai
Red Cotton // Shelley Parker
Hidden Tropics // Alex Kassian
Sangue de Galo // Serpente
1000 Speedboats // Great Dad
Trigger Finger // ZULI
Police Blow My Wad // Afroman
